easy.q: I have days and nights, but I never sleep. I tell you when to wake up and when to eat. What am I?
easy.hint: Look for something that measures time.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think about a word whose meaning changes when you add letters.

hard.q: Without being alive, I can grow; without breathing, I still move; with no mouth, I can tell a tale. What am I?
hard.hint: It follows you and changes with light.
